extendedInfo.description: A fantastic personal tool. Fun and easy. An interactive way to calculate daily and weekly calories in your diet.All in three easy steps:- Identify the dishes from the menu and equip your table- Choose the sport you have practiced today- Discover daily and weekly calories in the diaryYou'll always have an eye on a counter of the calories consumed in the day, so you can adjust in an immediate, simple and personal way your diet.* Note: Italian only, we'll publish other languages soon. Stay tuned.Keywords: my diet, diet, diets, calorie counter, calories, food, weight-loss, weigh, cardio, meal planner, nutrition, tracker, fit, fitness trainer, personal assistant, pocket-size manager, easy diet, hot apps, simple tool, manager, grocery list, recipe search, exercise, monitor, progress reports, weight watchers, vegetarian diet plan, vegan, BMR, slimming world, atkins, detox, GI diet, hcg, south beach, Jenny Craig, Dukan, fad, abs, medifast, mediterranean, personal diets, zone weight chart, weight graph, diary, log, recorder, flat belly, lemonade diet, paleo, celebrity, cholesterol.

reviews.title: Utile, comoda ma anche divertente!
reviews.comment: L\'ho installata sul tablet di mia madre, \303\250 veloce, semplice,fluida e fa bene quello che deve fare! Utilissima per tenere sotto controllo le calorie, sia quelle ingerite che quelle bruciate :D
reviews.author: Dino Nicotera
